TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract PageSetup

summary.span: 代表页面设置说明。

span.span: Represents the page setup description.

summary.span: PageSetup 对象包含作为特性的所有页面设置属性（左边距、下边距、纸张大小等）。

span.span: The PageSetup object contains all page setup attributes (left margin, bottom margin, paper size, and so on) as properties.

span.para: 使用PageSetup属性可返回一个PageSetup对象。
Use the PageSetup property to return a PageSetup object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BookFoldPrinting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 对文档进行打印在一系列的小册子以便打印好的页面可以折叠和作为书籍阅读。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to print a document in a series of booklets so the printed pages can be folded and read as a book.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BookFoldPrintingSheets { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个整数，它代表每个小册子的页数。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer which represents the number of pages for each booklet.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BookFoldRevPrinting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真 为 Microsoft Word 以逆序打印的书籍折页的双向或亚洲语言文档的打印。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to reverse the printing order for book fold printing of bidirectional or Asian language documents.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float BottomMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的下边缘与正文文本边界之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the bottom edge of the page and the bottom boundary of the body text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float CharsLine { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档网格中每行的字符数。

span.span: Returns or sets the number of characters per line in the document grid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DifferentFirstPageHeaderFooter { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果不同的页眉或页脚使用第一页上。

span.span: True if a different header or footer is used on the first page.

summary.span: 可 真 、 假 或 wdUndefined 。

span.span: Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray FirstPageTray { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置用于文档或节的第一页的纸盒。

span.span: Returns or sets the paper tray to use for the first page of a document or section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float FooterDistance { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页脚和页面底部之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the footer and the bottom of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Gutter { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置的添加到文档或节的绑定中的每个页面的额外边距空间量 （以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the amount (in points) of extra margin space added to each page in a document or section for binding.

span.para: 如果属性设置为True， Gutter属性添加额外空间内边距。否则，与左边距添加额外的空间。
If the property is set to True, the Gutter property adds the extra space to the inside margins. Otherwise, the extra space is added to the left margin.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GutterOnTop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle GutterPos { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档中的装订线位于哪一侧。

span.span: Returns or sets on which side the gutter appears in a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld GutterStyle { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置是否 Microsoft Word 使用从右到左或从左到右语言基于当前文档的装订线。

span.span: Returns or sets whether Microsoft Word uses gutters for the current document based on a right-to-left language or a left-to-right language.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float HeaderDistance { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置标题页面顶部的距离 （以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the header and the top of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode LayoutMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置当前文档的布局模式。

span.span: Returns or sets the layout mode for the current document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LeftMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面左边的缘与正文文本的左边的界之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the left edge of the page and the left boundary of the body text.

span.para: 如果属性设置为True， LeftMargin属性控制的设置内边距和属性控制外边距的设置。
If the property is set to True, the LeftMargin property controls the setting for inside margins and the property controls the setting for outside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ LineNumbering { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置对象，表示为指定的行号对象。

span.span: Returns or sets the object that represents the line numbers for the specified object.

span.para: 您必须在页面视图，才能看到行号。
You must be in print layout view to see line numbering.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LinesPage { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档网格中的每页行数。

span.span: Returns or sets the number of lines per page in the document grid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MirrorMargins { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果对开页的外侧页边距等宽。

span.span: True if the inside and outside margins of facing pages are the same width.

summary.span: 可 真 、 假 或 wdUndefined 。

span.span: Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

span.para: MirrorMargins属性设置为True，如果属性控制设置内边距和属性控制外边距的设置。
If the MirrorMargins property is set to True, the property controls the setting for inside margins and the property controls the setting for outside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int OddAndEvenPagesHeaderFooter { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: True如果指定对象具有不同页眉和页脚的奇数和偶数页。

span.span: True if the specified object has different headers and footers for odd-numbered and even-numbered pages.

summary.span: 可 真 、 假 或 wdUndefined 。

span.span: Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation Orientation { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的方向。

span.span: Returns or sets the orientation of the page.

span.para: 一些常量可能不可用，具体取决于您已选择或安装的语言支持 （例如，美国英语）。
Some of the constants may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you’ve selected or installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray OtherPagesTray { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置要可用于所有但文档或节的第一页的纸盒。

span.span: Returns or sets the paper tray to be used for all but the first page of a document or section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float PageHeight { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的高度，以磅为单位。

span.span: Returns or sets the height of the page in points.

span.para: 设置PageHeight属性更改属性设为wdPaperCustom。
PaperSize属性用于设置的页面的高度和宽度为那些预定义的纸张大小，如字母或 A4。
Setting the PageHeight property changes the property to wdPaperCustom.
Use the PaperSize property to set the page height and width to those of a predefined paper size, such as Letter or A4.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float PageWidth { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的宽度，以磅为单位。

span.span: Returns or sets the width of the page in points.

span.para: 设置PageWidth属性更改属性设为wdPaperCustom。
PaperSize属性用于设置的页面的高度和宽度为那些预定义的纸张大小，如字母或 A4。
Setting the PageWidth property changes the property to wdPaperCustom.
Use the PaperSize property to set the page height and width to those of a predefined paper size, such as Letter or A4.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize PaperSize { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置纸张大小。

span.span: Returns or sets the paper size.

span.para: 设置或属性会将PaperSize属性更改为wdPaperCustom。
Setting the or property changes the PaperSize property to wdPaperCustom.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个对象，代表指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RightMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的右边缘与正文文本的右边界之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the right edge of the page and the right boundary of the body text.

span.para: 如果属性设置为True， RightMargin属性控制外边距的设置和属性控制设置内边距。
If the property is set to True, the RightMargin property controls the setting for outside margins and the property controls the setting for inside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection SectionDirection { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置阅读顺序和对齐方式指定节。

span.span: Returns or sets the reading order and alignment for the specified sections.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart SectionStart { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的分节符的类型。

span.span: Returns or sets the type of section break for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAsTemplateDefault() runtime managed

summary.span: 将指定的页面设置格式设为活动文档和所有基于活动模板的新文档的默认格式。

span.span: Sets the specified page setup formatting as the default for the active document and all new documents based on the active template.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowGrid { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 此成员仅适用于 Macintosh 并且不应使用。

span.span: This member is for Macintosh only and should not be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SuppressEndnotes { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果下一个没有隐藏尾注的节的末尾打印尾注。

span.span: True if endnotes are printed at the end of the next section that doesn't suppress endnotes.

summary.span: 在该节的尾注之前打印隐藏的尾注。

span.span: Suppressed endnotes are printed before the endnotes in that section.

span.para: 此属性才会生效属性设置为wdEndOfSection。
This property takes effect only if the property is set to wdEndOfSection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ TextColumns { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回集合，代表指定的文本栏的集对象。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the set of text columns for the specified object.

span.para: 集合中将始终至少一个文本列。当您创建新的文本列中，您要添加到一列的集合。
There will always be at least one text column in the collection. When you create new text columns, you're adding to a collection of one column.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TogglePortrait() runtime managed

summary.span: 在文档或节的纵向和横向页面方向之间切换。

span.span: Switches between portrait and landscape page orientations for a document or section.

span.para: 如果指定的节有不同的页面方向，将发生错误。
If the specified sections have different page orientations, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float TopMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置页面的上边缘与正文文本上部边界之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the top edge of the page and the top boundary of the body text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TwoPagesOnOne { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果 Microsoft Word 打印指定的文档的两页。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word prints the specified document two pages per sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdVerticalAlignment VerticalAlignment { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdVerticalAlignment get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdVerticalAlignment value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档或节中每页文本的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of text on each page in a document or section.
